name: foehn-design-system
description: One place for service teams to find styles, components and patterns for designing government services.
author: Direction générale du numérique et des systèmes d'information

scripts.prestart: echo "[ Cleaning build directories ]" && rm -rf public && echo "[ Copying Foehn assets ]" && copyfiles node_modules/@dsivd/foehn/dist/assets/**/*.* public/ --error --up 5

scripts.postbuild: echo "[ Copying Foehn assets ]" && copyfiles node_modules/@dsivd/foehn/dist/assets/**/*.* public/ --error --verbose --up 5
